org.gradle.api.component

Interface Component

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    Application, IvyModule, JvmLibrary, Library, MavenModule, NativeExecutable, NativeLibrary, PrebuiltLibrary

    @Incubating
public interface Component
    A software component that can be queried via the Artifact Query API.
    Since:
    2.0
